posts.post_content: A little expensive for my tastes - most red decks that hit eight mana are either doing something wrong or else probably won't need to clear the board - but there's no denying its power and it kicks ass in multiplayer. Good storyline moment too.

posts.post_content:
@Kirbster In the novel, when Barrin did this to his homeland, he reflected that he was basically doing the same thing Urza did with the [Golgothian Sylex](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Golgothian Sylex) (which is horribly underwhelming for such a powerful in-story artifact), but with himself as the vessel instead of an artifact.  
  
I think it even describes how he feels as the sheer amount of mana he's channeling rips him to bits.
posts.html:
@Kirbster In the novel, when Barrin did this to his homeland, he reflected that he was basically doing the same thing Urza did with the Golgothian Sylex (which is horribly underwhelming for such a powerful in-story artifact), but with himself as the vessel instead of an artifact.

I think it even describes how he feels as the sheer amount of mana he's channeling rips him to bits.
